show_name: A Dark Rabbit Has Seven Lives (TV)
other_title: いつか天魔の黒ウサギ (Japanese)
plot: When Taito Kurogane was little he met Himea Saito, a vampire girl who gave him a curse of living after dying, but dies after being killed the 7th time. Himea was then taken away from Taito, who loses all memory of her. After 9 years, Taito is now in high school, and has freed Himea, and they begin to catch up on the 9 years away from each other.
